data.text: @Walterdude1664 Tragically, we havent seen the worst yet. If it goes how they planned, there will be tragedy, there will be so many orphaned children

@BabeTruth2 @SFreemancraig @KDooher @Nanny12257510 I listed the CDC data that was cited... nowhere in the JCVI does it break down by age/gender. It's all clumped as 5-11 year olds, one big group. @BabeTruth2 @SFreemancraig @KDooher @Nanny12257510 (a) This is not categorizes by demographic. In 5-11, boys have 2x risk as girls, for example (in 12-17, it is 9x) (b) This comes out to a 1 in 250k chance... all for a 1 in 340k to 1 in 2 million chance of preventing an ICU admission.
